duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor jobs controlled by an automated scheduling system to include adding and removing jobs from the scheduler.
Use monitoring tools to monitor the company network as well as the nightly store polling system.
Use monitoring tools to monitor the company store pc network.
Manually submit batch processing jobs and monitor to completion.
Troubleshoot problems and assist in problem resolution.
Notify appropriate personnel of exceptions (ex: batch processing errors).
Assist shift Team Leader in department initiatives.
Knowledge of AS/400, UNIX, and Microsoft commands preferred.
Working knowledge of automated batch processing.
Knowledge of Data Center Infrastructure Management (DCIM) tools.
Bachelor’s Degree or Bachelor’s degree in a computer-related course of study.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or Bachelor’s degree in a computer related course of study.
